DOC.brief_summary: Up 15 subject enrol . Enrolled subject receive one Ulthera® treatment face neck . Follow-up visit occur 45 , 90 180 day post-treatment . Study image obtain pre-treatment , immediately post-treatment , follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Ulthera® System Treatment Face Neck
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single-center , pilot clinical trial evaluate efficacy Ulthera® System improve jawline definition submental skin laxity . Changes baseline Fitzpatrick Facial Wrinkle Scale facial pigmentation assess study follow-up visit . Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale score , patient satisfaction questionnaire , quality life questionnaire obtain .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year . Subject good health . Score 1 6 Fitzpatrick 's Classification Wrinkling Scale . Mild moderate rhytids periorbital perioral region . Mild moderate laxity area treat , include length depth line . Mild moderate vertical perioral line Mild moderate marionette line . Subjects desire lift tighten periorbital , perioral , cheek tissue , improvement jawline definition and/or submental skin laxity Understands accept obligation undergo procedure area treat followup period . Willingness ability comply protocol requirement , include return followup visit abstain exclusionary procedure duration study . Presence active systemic local skin disease may affect wound healing . Severe solar elastosis . Excessive subcutaneous fat cheek . Excessive skin laxity lower face neck . Deep wrinkle , numerous line , without redundant skin area treat . Excessive hooding without redundant skin area treat .
